backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing user access control and CRUD operations for goals and user profiles using map-based storage and authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to corresponding frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining color tokens, theme variables, and base dark/light mode styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app defining authentication-aware layout and all routes for pages including goals, settings, profile, and new bottom-nav pages.
frontend/src/components/app/AppBottomNav: Mobile-only sticky bottom navigation bar with six route links and active highlighting.
frontend/src/components/app/AppNav.tsx: Desktop navigation bar showing links to core pages with active route styling.
frontend/src/components/app/AppShell.tsx: App layout wrapper providing header, footer, conditional bottom nav, and authenticated spacing for mobile navigation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthControl: Provides sign-in and sign-out controls using Internet Identity and displays the user's name when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/goals/GoalCard.t: Renders a clickable card showing a goalâ€™s title, status, description, progress, and target date.
frontend/src/components/goals/GoalForm.t: Form for creating or editing goals with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their profile name on first use.
frontend/src/components/state/EmptyGoals: Displays an empty-state illustration and button to create the first goal.
frontend/src/components/state/LoadingSta: Provides skeleton loading placeholders for goal lists and goal detail views.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for handling Internet Identity login, logout, and stored identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and goals through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus base element styling.
frontend/src/lib/goals/types.ts: Provides status label/color helpers and exports all goal statuses.
frontend/src/lib/goals/validation.ts: Validates goal titles and progress values with simple rules.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Contains utilities for converting, formatting, and displaying bigint timestamp values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AveragesPage.tsx: Fetches goals and displays average progress and completion metrics with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/CreateGoalPage.tsx: Renders a goal creation form and submits new goals before navigating back.
frontend/src/pages/GoalDetailPage.tsx: Loads a single goal, supports updating and deleting it, and handles loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/GoalsDashboardPage.ts: Displays all goals with status filters, handling loading, empty, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LanguagesPage.tsx: Shows a placeholder card for future language selection settings.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows a placeholder card for upcoming notification preference settings.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays the user's profile info with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page that loads user profile, validates name input, and saves updates with success/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Statistics page that loads all goals and displays counts and progress metrics with loading and error states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, pending requests, navigation plans, and statistics requirements.
